message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it's only fair to propose a price of $1300000 for this exceptional item. I understand its value to you is $1500000, and I hope we can find common ground.

Alice, your offer is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save as much as possible.  I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product.  I believe this is a fair price, considering your value and my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to adjust the price to $1250000. This reflects a compromise between our positions and allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while still being competitive. I look forward to your consideration.
